name: Solitaire Cash - Cards Game
description:
Solitaire Cash - Cards Game is the top classic solitaire card game for iOS, with real-money cash prizes!

If you like classic cards games, you're going to love Solitaire Cash!

We have carefully designed a cool Solitaire modern look, that mixes perfectly into the wonderful Solitaire classic feel that everyone loves.

Game highlights:
- Real-money tournaments
- No ads
- Classic Solitaire gameplay
- Optimized for mobile phone play
- Big and easy to see cards
- Undo moves


If you like playing Solitaire on PC or Solitaire classic style then you will love Solitaire Cash - Cards Game!
